alert.note: Alert for Madison; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 1:42PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FAYETTE...NORTHEASTERN CLINTON...WESTERN PICKAWAY...SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...SOUTHERN MADISON AND NORTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM EST... At 141 PM EST, a snow shower was located near Jeffersonville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. In addition, bridges and overpasses may become briefly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Jeffersonville, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Staunton, Good Hope, Clarksburg, Midway, Bowersville, Darbyville, Milledgeville, Octa, Deer Creek Lake, Chenoweth, Interstate 71 at State Route 38, Rosemoor, and Madison Mills. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 60 and 90. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
